entry.title: Friday: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 50 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
